seniority_level.evidence: 6+ years overall experience with 4+ years in Python/Spark, responsibilities include managing end-to-end feature development and resolving complex challenges

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Data Platforms' with core focus on Python, Spark, PySpark for data processing and feature development

sub_specialty.evidence: Strong emphasis on Spark and PySpark for batch processing, no streaming technologies mentioned, focus on feature development and debugging

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include managing end-to-end feature development and resolving implementation challenges, suggesting technical leadership without direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS, GCP, and Azure all mentioned as nice-to-have skills with no clear primary cloud provider specified

secondary_clouds.evidence: Since primary cloud is multi-cloud approach, no specific secondary clouds to list

processing_paradigm.evidence: Strong focus on Spark and PySpark for batch processing, no streaming or real-time technologies mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned (Airflow, etc.), only Spark job scheduling implied

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data warehouse, lake, or storage technologies mentioned in the job description

remote_restriction.evidence: No remote work model or location restrictions specified in the job posting

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or team distribution mentioned, only location specified as Pune, India

relocation_required.evidence: No explicit relocation requirements mentioned, role is based in Pune with no indication people need to relocate there

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and role is based in India, H1B is US-specific and not applicable for India-based position

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, OPT/CPT, or work authorization requirements

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements specified in the job posting

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No employment type or contract structure mentioned, though IBM typically offers full-time positions

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, compensation, or perks mentioned anywhere in the job description

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'limitless career path with the world's technology leader' but provides no specific career tracks or advancement details

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship program, working with senior staff, or collaborative learning environment mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: Only generic career path language mentioned, no specific promotion or advancement path detailed

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned, only generic career growth language

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-haves (Python, Spark, PySpark) and nice-to-haves (AWS, GCP, Azure), balanced requirement structure

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description specifically for Data Engineer role with well-defined responsibilities and technical requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 6+ years experience requirement is reasonable for senior data engineer role, skills listed are appropriate for the experience level
